name: Sarah Chen
title: Senior Product Manager
bio: Passionate product manager with 8+ years of experience building fintech products. Led teams at Google and Stripe, focusing on payment infrastructure and mobile experiences. Stanford MBA with a CS background from UC Berkeley.

experience.title: Senior Product Manager
experience.description: Leading payment infrastructure products for global merchants. Launched new API features that increased developer adoption by 40%. Managed cross-functional teams of 15+ engineers and designers.

experience.title: Product Manager
experience.description: Managed Google Pay features for mobile payments. Led A/B testing initiatives that improved user engagement by 25%. Collaborated with Android and iOS teams.

experience.title: Business Analyst
experience.description: Consulted for Fortune 500 companies on digital transformation strategies. Specialized in fintech and payments industry analysis.
